en.title: **Cybersecurity Mentor**
en.text:
Mentored over 300 students through workshops and hands-on labs covering:

  • Secure coding, OWASP Top 10, API protection
  • Cloud fundamentals: IAM, S3 access, and cloud monitoring
  • Networking: IP addressing, VLANs, and routing using Packet Tracer
  • Secure backend flows and version control in full-stack projects

Organized 15+ interactive sessions including live CTFs and attack-defense simulations, boosting engagement by 80% and improving peer code quality by 30%.

en.title: **Bug Bounty Hunter**
en.text:
Actively hunting real-world web vulnerabilities and reporting them responsibly across platforms like HackerOne and Bugcrowd. Specialized in:

  • OWASP Top 10 exploitation
  • Advanced recon, bypass techniques, and logic flaws
  • API abuse and misconfiguration detection

Continuously sharpening offensive security skills through hands-on challenges and platform reports.
